verbose_text: Interestingly, LPS stimulated macrophages (M (LPS)) when co-stimulated with CD8 showed an increase in phagocytic activity by 20% compared to the IgG1 control situation (P < 0.001), suggesting a synergistic effect of CD8 and LPS stimulation (XREF_FIG).
evidence: LPS-stimulated macrophages (M(LPS)) when co-stimulated with CD8 showed an increase in phagocytic activity by 20% compared to the IgG1 control situation (P < 0.001), suggesting a synergistic effect of CD8
